label: Define and prepare the development environment (15-20%)

skills.label: Select development environment
items: May include but is not limited to: assess the deployment environment constraints, analyze and recommend tools that meet system requirements, select the development environment

skills.label: Set up development environment
items: May include but is not limited to: create an azure data science environment, configure data science work environments

skills.label: Quantify the business problem
items: May include but is not limited to: define technical success metrics, quantify risks

skills.label: Transform data into usable datasets
items: May include but is not limited to: develop data structures, design a data sampling strategy, design the data preparation flow

skills.label: Perform Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA)
items: May include but is not limited to: review visual analytics data to discover patterns and determine next steps, identify anomalies, outliers, and other data inconsistencies, create descriptive statistics for a dataset

skills.label: Cleanse and transform data
items: May include but is not limited to: resolve anomalies, outliers, and other data inconsistencies, standardize data formats, set the granularity for data

skills.label: Perform feature extraction
items: May include but is not limited to: perform feature extraction algorithms on numerical data, perform feature extraction algorithms on non-numerical data, scale features

skills.label: Perform feature selection
items: May include but is not limited to: define the optimality criteria, apply feature selection algorithms

skills.label: Select an algorithmic approach
items: May include but is not limited to: determine appropriate performance metrics, implement appropriate algorithms, consider data preparation steps that are specific to the selected algorithms

skills.label: Split datasets
items: May include but is not limited to: determine ideal split based on the nature of the data, determine number of splits, determine relative size of splits, ensure splits are balanced

skills.label: Identify data imbalances
items: May include but is not limited to: resample a dataset to impose balance, adjust performance metric to resolve imbalances, implement penalization

skills.label: Train the model
items: May include but is not limited to: select early stopping criteria, tune hyper-parameters

skills.label: Evaluate model performance
items: May include but is not limited to: score models against evaluation metrics, implement cross-validation, identify and address overfitting, identify root cause of performance results
